descriptions.en: Home air conditioner
This property indicates the ON/OFF status.
This property indicates the ON/OFF status.
On
Off
This property indicates the installation location
This property indicates the installation location

remark.ja: bitmap(例 0x00: 未設定(初期値), 0x08: リビング)

descriptions.ja: 対応するAPPENDIXのリリース番号を示す
descriptions.en: This property indicates the release number of the corresponding Appendix.

descriptions.ja: 対応するAPPENDIXのリリース番号を示す
descriptions.en: This property indicates the release number of the corresponding Appendix.

remark.ja: 1,2バイト目は0x00。3バイト目は機器オブジェクトのリリースバージョンをASCIIで表す。リリース Aのみ小文字で0x61, B以降は大文字で0x42, 0x43...。4バイト目は、そのリリースバージョンのリビジョン番ををASCIIで表す(0x00～0xFF)。
remark.en: 1st and 2nd data is 0x00. 3rd data is the release version of Device Object in ASCII. Only release A utilize lower case letter 0x61, Release B and later utilize upper case letter such as 0x42, 0x43... 4th data is the revision number of the release version in ASCII (0x00 - 0xFF).

descriptions.ja: オブジェクトを固有に識別する番号
descriptions.en: A number that allows each object to be uniquely identified.

descriptions.ja: オブジェクトを固有に識別する番号
descriptions.en: A number that allows each object to be uniquely identified.

remark.ja: 1バイト目は0xFE。2～4バイト目はメーカコード。残りは機器毎のユニーク値
remark.en: 1st data is 0xFE. 2nd to 4th data is manufacture code. The rest should be unique to each device.

descriptions.ja: 機器の積算消費電力を0.001kWhで示す
descriptions.en: This property indicates the cumulative power consumption of the device in increments of 0.001kWh.

descriptions.ja: 機器の積算消費電力を0.001kWhで示す
descriptions.en: This property indicates the cumulative power consumption of the device in increments of 0.001kWh.

descriptions.ja: 各メーカ独自の異常コードを示す
descriptions.en: This property indicates the manufacturer-defined fault code.

descriptions.ja: 各メーカ独自の異常コードを示す
descriptions.en: This property indicates the manufacturer-defined fault code.

descriptions.ja: 何らかの異常(センサトラブル等)の発生状況を示す
descriptions.en: This property indicates whether a fault (e.g. a sensor trouble) has occurred or not.

descriptions.ja: 何らかの異常(センサトラブル等)の発生状況を示す
descriptions.en: This property indicates whether a fault (e.g. a sensor trouble) has occurred or not.
Fault occurred.
No fault has occurred.
Describes the fault.
Describes the fault.

remark.ja: Appendixの2.5章 異常内容プロパティ参照
remark.en: See Chapter 2.5 'Fault Description' Property of the Appendix.

descriptions.en: 3-byte manufacturer code
3-byte manufacturer code
Identifies the product using ASCII code.
Identifies the product using ASCII code.

descriptions.ja: 機器の節電動作を設定し、状態を取得する
descriptions.en: This property indicates whether the device is operating in power-saving mode.

descriptions.ja: 機器の節電動作を設定し、状態を取得する
descriptions.en: This property indicates whether the device is operating in power-saving mode.
Operating in power-saving mode
Operating in normal operation mode
Location information
Location information

descriptions.ja: 風量レベルおよび風量自動状態を設定し、設定状態を取得する。風量レベルは8段階で指定
descriptions.en: Used to specify the air flow rate or use the function to automatically control the air flow rate, and to acquire the current setting. The air flow rate shall be selected from among the 8 predefined levels.

descriptions.ja: 風量レベルおよび風量自動状態を設定し、設定状態を取得する。風量レベルは8段階で指定
descriptions.en: Used to specify the air flow rate or use the function to automatically control the air flow rate, and to acquire the current setting. The air flow rate shall be selected from among the 8 predefined levels.
Automatic air flow rate control function used.

descriptions.ja: 風向き上下左右のAUTO/非AUTOを設定し、設定状態を取得する
descriptions.en: Used to specify whether or not to use the automatic air flow direction control function, to specify the plane(s) (vertical and/or horizontal) in which the automatic air flow direction control function is to be used, and to acquire the current setting.

propertyName.en: Automatic control of air flow direction setting

descriptions.ja: 風向き上下左右のAUTO/非AUTOを設定し、設定状態を取得する
descriptions.en: Used to specify whether or not to use the automatic air flow direction control function, to specify the plane(s) (vertical and/or horizontal) in which the automatic air flow direction control function is to be used, and to acquire the current setting.
Automatic
Non-automatic
Automatic (vertical)
Automatic (horizontal)

descriptions.ja: 上下方向の風向きを5通りのパターンで設定し、設定状態を取得する
descriptions.en: Used to specify the air flow direction in the vertical plane by selecting a pattern from among the 5 predefined patterns, and to acquire the current setting.

descriptions.ja: 上下方向の風向きを5通りのパターンで設定し、設定状態を取得する
descriptions.en: Used to specify the air flow direction in the vertical plane by selecting a pattern from among the 5 predefined patterns, and to acquire the current setting.
Uppermost
Lowermost
Central
Midpoint between uppermost and central
Midpoint between lowermost and central

descriptions.ja: 自動/冷房/暖房/除湿/送風/その他の運転モードを設定し、設定状態を取得する
descriptions.en: Used to specify the operation mode ('automatic','cooling','heating','dehumidification','air circulator' or 'other'), and to acquire the current setting.

descriptions.ja: 自動/冷房/暖房/除湿/送風/その他の運転モードを設定し、設定状態を取得する
descriptions.en: Used to specify the operation mode ('automatic','cooling','heating','dehumidification','air circulator' or 'other'), and to acquire the current setting.
Automatic
Cooling
Heating
Dehumidification
Air circulation
Other

descriptions.ja: 温度設定値を設定し、設定状態を取得する
descriptions.en: Used to set the temperature and to acquire the current setting.

descriptions.ja: 温度設定値を設定し、設定状態を取得する
descriptions.en: Used to set the temperature and to acquire the current setting.
Undefined
Measured value of room relative humidity
